title: Ingame Ping Spikes Up HELP!?
body: I have a steady FPS so I dont think FPS is the problem and my ping should be around 30-45 normally but sometimes when Im playing it just spikes up to 200+ at least and sometimes even 1000, during a 45 mins game usually 1/3 of the time is like this. My desktop is using wireless, and Im a room away from router. My wifi bars max is 4 bars and sometimes it goes down to 3 bars for me but I fix that by adjusting my desktop's position and it goes to full but during full it still undergo ping spikes during ingame.     _**HELP!? PLZ**_

replies.body: _**Bump because I want to get this fixed asap!**_

This only started happening after 7.4 was released. FPS and PNG are both constant (and low), but the game spazzes out for 5 seconds, and then catches up. PLEASE HELP, it's making the game difficult to play

Troubles with your latency (ping) in-game are typically caused by an issue on your local network if the issue isn't caused by a problem along your network routing. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will help you ensure all your local network settings are compatible with League.

Please let me know if you see your issue persist through those changes.
